duties_responsibilities.duty: Own team-wide metrics, business review processes, and business intelligence to support continuous improvement of security processes and inform risk reduction activities.
Develop, query, and report on metrics to produce valuable insights about internal risk and drive technical and business projects.
Partner with multiple teams to produce comprehensive reports that educate senior leaders and lead to progress.
Coordinate with internal customers within the team and other security teams to ensure circular business processes produce valuable inputs and outputs.
Resolve ambiguities, align team plans to minimize risk, and drive engagement with partner organizations to surface opportunities to solve security problems.

Creating valuable insights about internal risk and drive technical and business projects. Collaborating with technical and non-technical stakeholders at all levels to track progress, flag issues, and ensure milestones are achieved.
Creating and managing technical project plans to reduce security risk.

Developing, querying, and reporting on metrics to produce valuable insights about internal risk. Partnering with multiple teams to produce comprehensive reports that educate senior leaders and lead to progress.

Identifying and quantifying security risk. Closely collaborating with technical and non-technical stakeholders at all levels to track progress on action items, flag issues, and ensure milestones are achieved.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
